inputs.script:
try 
    {
        Install-PackageProvider nuget -Scope CurrentUser -Force -Confirm:$false    
        Install-Module -Name AZ -AllowClobber -Scope CurrentUser -Force -Confirm:$False -SkipPublisherCheck       
        Install-Module -Name d365fo.tools -AllowClobber -Scope CurrentUser -Force -Confirm:$false 
        
        Write-Host "Successfull installation"
        $isSuccess = $True
    }
    catch
    {
        Write-Host "Failed to trigger request, Exception: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        $isSuccess = $False
    }

    Write-Host "##vso[task.setvariable variable=isSuccess]$isSuccess"

    return $isSuccess

name: cgkInstall-AZ-d365fo.tools
description: Install PackageProvider nuget, modules AZ + d365fo.tools
author: Francesco Feltrin
